title: OCE chat and matchmaking down?
body: My chat and matchmaking aren't working, same for a lot of other people - maybe the whole server - from what I can see. Bit concerning that there are posts from >4 hours ago and no response or fix yet... I think this should be a pretty high priority issue.

replies.body: yup ,funny how many hours can go by on a Sunday without even a reply ^^
It's Sunday now and still no reply? good logic
